adHeader: Summer is here! What are you waiting for?
adDetails: Intro to Personal Training Special 3 sessions for $75 Try out personal training at an awesome intro rate of $75 for three 45 minute sessions! for more information, please visit www.joepft.com Here is one of my clients testimonial: "Happiness is... having the workout come to YOU! I am now totally spoiled on the convenience of having Joe come to the office to help us stay on track. He does a great job keeping the corporate "Golden Girls" in line (we really are a handful). The group sessions keep us all accountable to each other and Joe has been super-dependable and always prepared to cajole and encourage us. His workouts are flexible and fun; Joe is a great coach to get us to try new things and push harder than before." http://www.joepft.com/testimonials.html
